name: Color Tile Rotate
description:
A minimalist puzzle game that you can play without any tutorial. You need to figure out how to connect every color on the board and pass the level yourself.
This amazing tapping game may look easy, but it is challenging to master.
Get ready to train your brain with hundreds of levels filled with tremendous challenges and brain teasers.


HOW TO PLAY:
• Tap to arrange the tiles so that their sides match each other in colors.
• Black lines appear when the sides are appropriately arranged.
• You’ll win when all tiles with the same color are connected.


FEATURES:
• One finger control.
• FREE & EASY TO PLAY.
• Thousand unique levels.
